title: Incorrect Logic with Added Filter in Table on Layout
description: We observe that the dataset initially contains 10 records (DataResultA).
OB: When we drag the dataset to the layout and add another filter (FilterB) to the table, the actual result is that the output of FilterB is based on DataResultA.
EB: When we drag the dataset to the layout and set another filter (FilterB) on the table, we expect that the result of FilterB should be based on DataResultB.
SR:
1. Drag the dataset to the layout.
2. Set another filter (FilterB) on the table.
